snippet: John Isner defeated Gilles Simon, 6-3, 6-2, 7-5, pulling the United States even with France on Friday in the Davis Cup quarterfinals in Roquebrune, France.
abstract: John Isner defeats Gilles Simon to pull the United States even with France in the Davis Cup quarterfinals in Roquebrune, France; other tennis results noted.
lead_paragraph: John Isner defeated Gilles Simon, 6-3, 6-2, 7-5, pulling the United States even with France on Friday in the Davis Cup quarterfinals in Roquebrune, France.
